dynamicVariables.query: SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE status IN ('ACTIVE', 'APPROVED') AND salary >= ${minSalary}
SELECT department_code, budget FROM departments WHERE department_code IN ${departmentCodes}

queries.sourceQuery: SELECT department_id, department_name, department_code, manager_id, budget, created_date, is_active FROM departments WHERE is_active = 1 ORDER BY department_id

SELECT user_id, username, email, first_name, last_name, status, department_id, created_date, last_login_date, is_active, salary, birth_date FROM users WHERE status IN ${statusList} AND created_date >= '${startDate}' AND salary >= ${minSalary} ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE is_active = 1 ORDER BY sort_order, category_id

SELECT customer_id, customer_code, company_name, contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone, address, city, country, customer_type, credit_limit, status, created_date, last_order_date FROM customers WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND created_date >= '${startDate}' ORDER BY customer_id

SELECT product_id, product_name, product_code, category_id, price, cost, stock_quantity, min_stock_level, status, description, created_date, updated_date, created_by FROM products WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND created_by IN (${activeUserIds}) ORDER BY product_id

SELECT order_id, order_number, customer_id, order_date, ship_date, total_amount, tax_amount, discount_amount, status, payment_method, shipping_address, notes, created_by FROM orders WHERE order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) AND status IN ('COMPLETED', 'SHIPPED', 'CONFIRMED') ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_id

SELECT oi.order_item_id, oi.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.discount_percent, oi.created_date FROM order_items oi INNER JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) AND o.status IN ('COMPLETED', 'SHIPPED', 'CONFIRMED') ORDER BY oi.order_id, oi.order_item_id
queries.deleteWhere: WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM orders o WHERE o.order_id = order_items.order_id AND o.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()))

queries.sourceQuery: SELECT log_id, user_id, action, table_name, record_id, old_values, new_values, ip_address, user_agent, created_date FROM activity_logs WHERE created_date >= DATEADD(day, -7, GETDATE()) AND user_id IN (${activeUserIds}) ORDER BY created_date DESC, log_id
